remarks: Lemma for ~ axsegcon .  Show that a particular mapping generates a point.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Sep-2013.)
statement:
axsegconlem2.1 $e |- S = sum_ p e. ( 1 ... N ) ( ( ( A ` p ) - ( B ` p ) ) ^ 2 ) $.
axsegconlem7.2 $e |- T = sum_ p e. ( 1 ... N ) ( ( ( C ` p ) - ( D ` p ) ) ^ 2 ) $.
axsegconlem8.3 $e |- F = ( k e. ( 1 ... N ) |-> ( ( ( ( ( sqrt ` S ) + ( sqrt ` T ) ) x. ( B ` k ) ) - ( ( sqrt ` T ) x. ( A ` k ) ) ) / ( sqrt ` S ) ) ) $.
axsegconlem8 $p |- ( ( ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ A =/= B ) /\ ( C e. ( EE ` N ) /\ D e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> F e. ( EE ` N ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d A p $.
$d B k $.
$d B p $.
$d C k $.
$d C p $.
$d D k $.
$d D p $.
$d N k $.
$d N p $.
$d S k $.
$d T k $.
